text.p: Choose Strength or Dexterity. You have advantage on checks of that type to overcome an opposing force, such as kicking open a stuck door (Strength) or slipping free of rusty chains (Dexterity).
If this is an Ancestry Talent, then check to see if the following effects were already added to your Character Effects section.
If this is a Class Talent, then add the following effects to the Character Effects section of the Note tab, and edit as needed.
